title: [Feature] Recently connected
author: SaschaJohn
body_snippet: I'd like to have a pseudo node in the connections tree with the last say 10 recently connected hosts. In my bunch of hosts I only use a few regularly.

iterations.description: Standard feature missing from UI; partial support exists in JumpListManager but is unused/disconnected.

notes:
AI triage (gemini): Standard feature missing from UI; partial support exists in JumpListManager but is unused/disconnected.
Approach: Extract recent connection tracking logic from JumpListManager into a shared service. Update ConnectionInitiator to register successful connections. Implement a 'Recently Connected' submenu in FileMenu and ensure JumpList is also updated.
